name: DeleteRemoteDesktopSecurityConfigurationTargetDeviceGroup
description: Delete targetDeviceGroup. Delete a targetDeviceGroup object for the remoteDesktopSecurityConfiguration object on the servicePrincipal. Any user authenticating using the Microsoft Entra ID Remote Desktop Services (RDS) authentication protocol to a Microsoft Entra joined or Microsoft Entra hybrid joined device that's in the removed targetDeviceGroup doesn't get SSO prompts.
